Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix
  • public class Matrix
extends Object
    This class represents the transformations being applied to the Canvas. Transformations are currently limited to rotate(deg), scale(factor) and translate(x, y). As such, it only performs 2D transformations. push() must be called before a set transformations are called and pop() can be called to return to the previous state of tranformations. The order in which transformations are applied also matter.

      void applyTransform​(javafx.scene.transform.Affine t)
      Advanced method to allow for JavaFX complex transformations to be applied, including Shears.
      static Matrix getMatrix()  
      void pop()
      Restores the previous state of Canvas before push() was called.
      void push()
      Saves the current state of the transformations.
      void reset()
      Removes all transformations that have been applied to the Canvas
      void rotate​(double degrees)
      Applies rotation to the Canvas where all points are rotated about the current position of the origin (0,0).
      void scale​(double ratio)
      Applies scaling to the Canvas where all points are scaled from the current position of the origin (0,0).
      void translate​(double x, double y)
      Applies a 2D translation that moves all points drawn afterward over by (x,y) pixels

    • Method Detail

      • getMatrix

        public static Matrix getMatrix()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Removes all transformations that have been applied to the Canvas

      • push

        public void push()
        Saves the current state of the transformations. A program can return to this state by calling pop()

      • pop

        public void pop()
        Restores the previous state of Canvas before push() was called.

      • translate

        public void translate​(double x,
                      double y)
        Applies a 2D translation that moves all points drawn afterward over by (x,y) pixels
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal shift
        y - The vertical shift

      • scale

        public void scale​(double ratio)
        Applies scaling to the Canvas where all points are scaled from the current position of the origin (0,0).
        Parameters:
        ratio - the scalar multiplying factor. >1 will enlarge, 0 < ratio < 1 will shrink. Negative reflects.

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(double degrees)
        Applies rotation to the Canvas where all points are rotated about the current position of the origin (0,0).
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle to be rotated in degrees, where positive is clockwise.

      • applyTransform

        public void applyTransform​(javafx.scene.transform.Affine t)
        Advanced method to allow for JavaFX complex transformations to be applied, including Shears.
        Parameters:
        t - A transformation matrix to be applied to the Canvas
